name: Quotation Register DFM
query:
select 
  sq.name as "Quotation No",
  sq.transaction_date as "Date:Date",
  sq.supplier as "Party Name",
  si.item_name as "Item Name",
  si.item_code as "Item Code",
  si.rate as "Rate",
  sq.currency as "Currency:Float:100",
  si.qty as "Qty:Float:100",
  si.uom as "UOM",
  sq.grand_total as "Net Total:Float:100"
  
  
  
from `tabSupplier Quotation` sq , `tabSupplier Quotation Item` si
where
 si.parent =sq.name and
   sq.docstatus = 1
